metadata.title: CVE-2023-31437 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in systemd 253. An attacker can modify a sealed log file such that, in some views, not all existing and sealed log messages are displayed. NOTE: the vendor reportedly sent "a reply denying that any of the finding was a security vulnerability."

notes.note: mdeslaur> This issue was disputed by upstream. Marking as deferred to see if it will eventually be fixed or not.

criterions.comment: systemd package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-06-28').
